## Inside of the fourth helix of Innovation {style="text-align:center"}

The **Lorraine Fab Living Lab® (LF2L®)** is a platform for innovation acceptability and prospective usage evaluation
supported by [Engineering School ENSGSI](https://ensgsi.univ-lorraine.fr/) and [ERPI Laboratory](https://erpi.univ-lorraine.fr/) of [Université de Lorraine](https://www.univ-lorraine.fr/). 
It supports the creation and achievement of results through an established process based on the usage paradigm, bringing together advanced, complementary tools in a single space.  [Find out more](/about.html){.btn .btn-primary .btn role="button" data-toggle="tooltip" title="Here's a tooltip" }
